name: Chicken Stir-Fry with Broccoli
instructions: Heat oil, stir-fry chicken until golden. Add broccoli and garlic. Serve over rice with soy sauce.

name: Tomato Pasta
instructions: Cook pasta. Sauté garlic and onion, add tomatoes. Toss with pasta and olive oil.

name: Baked Salmon with Rice
instructions: Season salmon, bake at 375°F for 15 min. Serve with rice and lemon wedge.

name: Cheesy Egg Scramble
instructions: Scramble eggs in butter, add cheese and diced tomato. Serve hot.

name: Bean and Rice Bowl
instructions: Cook rice. Sauté onion, pepper, garlic. Add beans, serve over rice.

name: Potato and Broccoli Salad
instructions: Boil potato and broccoli. Dice and mix with olive oil and lemon dressing.

name: Garlic Butter Chicken
instructions: Pan-fry chicken in garlic butter. Serve with rice and lemon.

name: Fresh Garden Salad
instructions: Chop vegetables, mix with olive oil and lemon dressing.

name: Chicken Fried Rice
instructions: Stir-fry rice with chicken, scrambled egg, carrot, and onion.

name: Creamy Pasta Bake
instructions: Make cheese sauce with milk and flour. Mix with pasta, top with cheese, bake.

name: Spicy Chicken Wings
instructions: Toss chicken wings with melted butter, minced garlic, and hot spice mix. Bake at 425°F for 35-40 min until crispy. Serve with lemon wedges.

name: Mango Salad
instructions: Dice mango, chop lettuce. Toss with olive oil and lemon juice. Serve chilled.

name: Avocado Toast
instructions: Toast bread. Mash avocado and spread on toast. Top with fried or poached egg. Season with salt and pepper.
